languages.text: "Восстанием руководит некто под именем Заря. Судя по данным, прямо сейчас глава культистов находится здесь — в святилище древнего реактора. Учитывая проповеди о последнем восходе и особые усилия, предпринятые врагами Человечества по захвату монастыря, их цель — добраться до управляющего контура священного источника энергии и вызвать необратимые процессы. Иначе говоря — взорвать реактор, самостоятельно породив пресловутый "последний восход".

traits.locale_text: "Восстанием руководит некто под именем Заря. Судя по данным, прямо сейчас глава культистов находится здесь — в святилище древнего реактора. Учитывая проповеди о последнем восходе и особые усилия, предпринятые врагами Человечества по захвату монастыря, их цель — добраться до управляющего контура священного источника энергии и вызвать необратимые процессы. Иначе говоря — взорвать реактор, самостоятельно породив пресловутый "последний восход".

languages.text: "Someone by the name of Aurora is leading the rebellion. Data indicates that the head of the cultists is here right now, in the sanctum of the ancient reactor. Given the prophecy of the Final Dawn and the especial efforts made by the enemies of Humanity to seize the monastery, their goal is to gain access to the holy power source's control circuit and trigger a process that, once started, cannot be stopped. In other words, to detonate the reactor, thus being themselves the cause of their much-touted 'final dawn.'"
languages.original_text: "Восстанием руководит некто под именем Заря. Судя по данным, прямо сейчас глава культистов находится здесь — в святилище древнего реактора. Учитывая проповеди о последнем восходе и особые усилия, предпринятые врагами Человечества по захвату монастыря, их цель — добраться до управляющего контура священного источника энергии и вызвать необратимые процессы. Иначе говоря — взорвать реактор, самостоятельно породив пресловутый "последний восход".

traits.locale_text: "A certain Aurora is leading the rebellion. Data indicates that the head of the cultists is here right now, at the sanctum of the ancient reactor. In view of the prophecy of the Final Dawn and the notable effort taken by the enemies of humanity in order to seize the monastery, their goal is to gain access to the holy power source's control circuit and start a runaway process. In other words, to detonate the reactor, thus being themselves the cause of their much-touted 'final dawn.'"

"A certain Aurora is leading the rebellion. Data indicates that the head of the cultists is here right now, at the sanctum of the ancient reactor. In view of the prophecy of the Final Dawn and the notable effort taken by the enemies of humanity in order to seize the monastery, their goal is to gain access to the holy power source's control circuit and start a runaway process. In other words, to detonate the reactor, thus being themselves the cause of their much-touted 'final dawn.'"

"Someone by the name of Aurora is leading the rebellion. Data indicates that the head of the cultists is here right now, in the sanctum of the ancient reactor. Given the prophecy of the Final Dawn and the especial efforts made by the enemies of humanity to seize the monastery, their goal is to gain access to the holy power source's control circuit and trigger a process that, once started, cannot be stopped. In other words, to detonate the reactor, thus being themselves the cause of their much-touted 'final dawn.'"

"Someone by the name of Aurora is leading the rebellion. Data indicates that the head of the cultists is here right now, in the sanctum of the ancient reactor. Given the prophecy of the Final Dawn and the especial efforts made by the enemies of humanity to seize the monastery, their goal is to gain access to the holy power source's control circuit and trigger a process that, once started, cannot be stopped. In other words, to detonate the reactor, thus being themselves the cause of their much-touted 'final dawn.'"

"Someone by the name of Aurora is leading the rebellion. Data indicates that the head of the cultists is here right now, in the sanctum of the ancient reactor. Given the prophecy of the Final Dawn and the especial efforts made by the enemies of Humanity to seize the monastery, their goal is to gain access to the holy power source's control circuit and trigger a process that, once started, cannot be stopped. In other words, to detonate the reactor, thus being themselves the cause of their much-touted 'final dawn.'"

languages.text: “某个叫‘极光’的家伙正在领导这场叛乱。数据显示，那群邪教徒的头目就在这里，在远古反应堆的圣殿里。考虑到终末黎明的预言，以及人类之敌大费周章占领这座修道院的事实，我认为他们的目标是入侵神圣动力源的控制电路，触发某个一旦启动就无法停止的过程。换句话说，他们打算引爆反应堆，亲自引发他们不断宣扬的所谓‘终末黎明’。”
languages.original_text: "Someone by the name of Aurora is leading the rebellion. Data indicates that the head of the cultists is here right now, in the sanctum of the ancient reactor. Given the prophecy of the Final Dawn and the especial efforts made by the enemies of Humanity to seize the monastery, their goal is to gain access to the holy power source's control circuit and trigger a process that, once started, cannot be stopped. In other words, to detonate the reactor, thus being themselves the cause of their much-touted 'final dawn.'"

traits.locale_text: “某个叫‘极光’的家伙正在领导这场叛乱。数据显示，那群邪教徒的头目就在这里，在远古反应堆的圣殿里。考虑到终末黎明的预言，以及人类之敌大费周章占领这座修道院的事实，我认为他们的目标是入侵神圣动力源的控制电路，触发某个一旦启动就无法停止的过程。换句话说，他们打算引爆反应堆，亲自引发他们不断宣扬的所谓‘终末黎明’。”

languages.text: 「オーロラと名乗る人物が反乱を率いている。データによると、カルティストのトップは今まさにここ、古代炉の聖域にいる。最後の夜明けの予言と、人類の敵が修道院を奪取するために行った特別な努力を考慮すると、彼らの目的は、聖なる動力源の制御回路にアクセスし、一度はじまったが最後、止めることのできないプロセスを起動することにある。つまり、古代炉を爆発させ、「最後の夜明け」と称される事件を、自らの手によって成就することにあるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Someone by the name of Aurora is leading the rebellion. Data indicates that the head of the cultists is here right now, in the sanctum of the ancient reactor. Given the prophecy of the Final Dawn and the especial efforts made by the enemies of Humanity to seize the monastery, their goal is to gain access to the holy power source's control circuit and trigger a process that, once started, cannot be stopped. In other words, to detonate the reactor, thus being themselves the cause of their much-touted 'final dawn.'"

traits.locale_text: 「オーロラと名乗る人物が反乱を率いている。データによると、カルティストのトップは今まさにここ、古代炉の聖域にいる。最後の夜明けの予言と、人類の敵が修道院を奪取するために行った特別な努力を考慮すると、彼らの目的は、聖なる動力源の制御回路にアクセスし、一度はじまったが最後、止めることのできないプロセスを起動することにある。つまり、古代炉を爆発させ、「最後の夜明け」と称される事件を、自らの手によって成就することにあるのだ」

languages.text: "Jemand namens Aurora führt die Rebellion an. Den Daten zufolge ist der Kopf der Kultisten derzeit hier, im Sanctum des alten Reaktors. Berücksichtigt man die Prophezeiung der letzten Dämmerung und die außerordentlichen Anstrengungen der Feinde der Menschheit, das Kloster einzunehmen, muss ihr Ziel lauten, Zugriff auf den Steuerstromkreis der heiligen Energiequelle zu erhalten und einen Prozess auszulösen, der dann nicht mehr gestoppt werden kann. Mit anderen Worten, den Reaktor zu sprengen, wodurch sie selbst zur Ursache ihrer vielgerühmten 'letzten Dämmerung' werden."
languages.original_text: "Someone by the name of Aurora is leading the rebellion. Data indicates that the head of the cultists is here right now, in the sanctum of the ancient reactor. Given the prophecy of the Final Dawn and the especial efforts made by the enemies of Humanity to seize the monastery, their goal is to gain access to the holy power source's control circuit and trigger a process that, once started, cannot be stopped. In other words, to detonate the reactor, thus being themselves the cause of their much-touted 'final dawn.'"

traits.locale_text: "Jemand namens Aurora führt die Rebellion an. Den Daten zufolge ist der Kopf der Kultisten derzeit hier, im Sanctum des alten Reaktors. Berücksichtigt man die Prophezeiung der letzten Dämmerung und die außerordentlichen Anstrengungen der Feinde der Menschheit, das Kloster einzunehmen, muss ihr Ziel lauten, Zugriff auf den Steuerstromkreis der heiligen Energiequelle zu erhalten und einen Prozess auszulösen, der dann nicht mehr gestoppt werden kann. Mit anderen Worten, den Reaktor zu sprengen, wodurch sie selbst zur Ursache ihrer vielgerühmten 'letzten Dämmerung' werden."

languages.text: « Une personne du nom d'Aurore est à la tête de la rébellion. Des données indiquent que la chef des cultistes est ici en ce moment même, dans le sanctum de l'ancien réacteur. Compte tenu de la prophétie de l'Aube finale et des efforts particuliers déployés par les ennemis de l'humanité pour s'emparer du monastère, je pense que leur objectif est d'accéder au circuit de contrôle de la source d'énergie sacrée et de déclencher un processus irréversible. En d'autres termes, ces fanatiques souhaitent faire exploser le réacteur, et par là conduire à l'avènement de leur "Aube finale" tant proclamée. »
languages.original_text: "Someone by the name of Aurora is leading the rebellion. Data indicates that the head of the cultists is here right now, in the sanctum of the ancient reactor. Given the prophecy of the Final Dawn and the especial efforts made by the enemies of Humanity to seize the monastery, their goal is to gain access to the holy power source's control circuit and trigger a process that, once started, cannot be stopped. In other words, to detonate the reactor, thus being themselves the cause of their much-touted 'final dawn.'"

traits.locale_text: « Une personne du nom d'Aurore est à la tête de la rébellion. Des données indiquent que la chef des cultistes est ici en ce moment même, dans le sanctum de l'ancien réacteur. Compte tenu de la prophétie de l'Aube finale et des efforts particuliers déployés par les ennemis de l'humanité pour s'emparer du monastère, je pense que leur objectif est d'accéder au circuit de contrôle de la source d'énergie sacrée et de déclencher un processus irréversible. En d'autres termes, ces fanatiques souhaitent faire exploser le réacteur, et par là conduire à l'avènement de leur "Aube finale" tant proclamée. »

languages.text: «Una mujer llamada Aurora lidera la rebelión. Según los datos, la líder de los sectarios está aquí ahora mismo, en el sanctum de un antiguo reactor. Dada la profecía del Amanecer Final y los esfuerzos tan concentrados que han dedicado los enemigos de la Humanidad a tomar el monasterio, su objetivo es hacerse con el circuito de control de la fuente de energía sagrada y activar un proceso imparable. Es decir, detonarán el reactor para así causar su ansiado "último amanecer"».
languages.original_text: "Someone by the name of Aurora is leading the rebellion. Data indicates that the head of the cultists is here right now, in the sanctum of the ancient reactor. Given the prophecy of the Final Dawn and the especial efforts made by the enemies of Humanity to seize the monastery, their goal is to gain access to the holy power source's control circuit and trigger a process that, once started, cannot be stopped. In other words, to detonate the reactor, thus being themselves the cause of their much-touted 'final dawn.'"

languages.original_text: "Someone by the name of Aurora is leading the rebellion. Data indicates that the head of the cultists is here right now, in the sanctum of the ancient reactor. Given the prophecy of the Final Dawn and the especial efforts made by the enemies of Humanity to seize the monastery, their goal is to gain access to the holy power source's control circuit and trigger a process that, once started, cannot be stopped. In other words, to detonate the reactor, thus being themselves the cause of their much-touted 'final dawn.'"

languages.text: "İsyanı Aurora adında biri yönetiyor. Veriler, tarikat liderinin şu anda burada, kadim reaktörün kutağında olduğunu belirtiyor. Nihai Şafak kehaneti ve İnsanlık düşmanlarının manastırı ele geçirmek için harcadığı istisnai çaba göz önüne alındığında anlaşılıyor ki amaçları, kutsal güç kaynağının kontrol devresine erişmek ve bir kez başlatıldığında durdurulamayacak bir süreci tetiklemek. Başka bir deyişle reaktörü patlatmak, böylece ağızlarından düşmeyen şu 'nihai şafağın' nedeni olmak."
languages.original_text: "Someone by the name of Aurora is leading the rebellion. Data indicates that the head of the cultists is here right now, in the sanctum of the ancient reactor. Given the prophecy of the Final Dawn and the especial efforts made by the enemies of Humanity to seize the monastery, their goal is to gain access to the holy power source's control circuit and trigger a process that, once started, cannot be stopped. In other words, to detonate the reactor, thus being themselves the cause of their much-touted 'final dawn.'"

Nihai Şafak kehaneti ve İnsanlık düşmanlarının manastırı ele geçirmek için harcadığı istisnai çaba göz önüne alındığında anlaşılıyor ki amaçları, kutsal güç kaynağının kontrol devresine erişmek ve bir kez başlatıldığında durdurulamayacak bir süreci tetiklemek.
